page.title: 09Travelling in Kirkby
page.content: Kirkby as a town is quite well served by transport. There is a fast local train service from Kirkby to Liverpool with three trains every hour each way. There is also an hourly service to Wigan going in the opposite direction. In our block there are a variety of regular bus services which link districts of Kirkby as well as other places such as Liverpool and Crosby. In the town centre there is plenty of parking space for those with cars, and traffic can usually move easily without the town getting congested. There are also many taxis in the town which are used frequently by many people.
